SpeakNaturally: Speak naturally and watch your words appear in emails, documents, social media - anywhere you want.
ClearHistoryWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all conversations.
VisitOurWebsite: Visit our website for more resources
StayUpdated: Stay updated with the latest features and connect with the qSpeak community
DeleteConversationWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the conversation.
PersonasDescription: Create and customize different personas for text transformation
SystemPromptsDescription: System prompts define how your AI assistant will behave and respond.
AudioInputDescription: The audio input device to use.
LanguageDescription: The language to use for transcription.
PreferredLanguagesDescription: Select your preferred languages for quick switching with shortcuts.
SwitchLanguageShortcutDescription: The shortcut to cycle through your preferred languages.
OpenSettingsOnStartDescription: Automatically open the settings window when the app starts.
CloseShortcutDescription: The shortcut to close the application.
PersonasShortcutDescription: The shortcut to open the personas menu.
ScreenshotShortcutDescription: The shortcut to take a screenshot.
CopyTextShortcutDescription: The shortcut to copy the text to the clipboard.
ToggleMinimizedShortcutDescription: The shortcut to toggle the minimized state of the application.
MinimizeShortcutDescription: The shortcut to minimize the recording window.
AIModelsDescription: Manage and select models for different AI tasks
PasteOnFinishDescription: Automatically paste the transcribed text when the recording is complete.
RecordOutputAudioDescription: Allow the LLM to receive audio from your speakers as additional input.
shortcutMustIncludeModifierAndCharacter: Must include a modifier (e.g. Ctrl, Shift) and a character key
ThemeDescription: The theme to use for recording window
browseConversations: Browse and manage your conversation history
VoiceCommandDescription: Say this phrase at the start of your conversation to activate this persona.
SystemPromptDescription: The system prompt defines how your AI assistant will behave and respond.
PersonaDescriptionDescription: A description of the persona to help you identify it.
Name: Name
PersonaNameDescription: The name of the persona to help you identify it.
manageModelsDescription1: Manage and configure AI models for transcription and conversation tasks.
manageModelsDescription2: Select the best models for your specific needs and performance requirements.
TranscriptionModelsTip: Speech-to-text models that convert your voice recordings into accurate text transcriptions. Choose between local models for privacy or cloud models for enhanced accuracy.
ConversationModelsNotFound: No models found (Local conversation models will be available soon...)
ConversationModelsTip: AI language models that power conversations and text processing. These models understand context, generate responses, and help with various language tasks. Some models include vision capabilities for image understanding.
manageToolsDescription1: Manage and configure tools used by qSpeak.
manageToolsDescription2: Tools allow you to extend the functionality of agents with custom scripts and integrations.
ToolsTip: Local tools run on your machine and can interact with your system, and files while external tools connect to remote services and APIs to extend qSpeak's capabilities.
LocalServerShortDescription: Run a local server on your machine to interact with your system and files.
ExternalServerShortDescription: Connect to a remote server to extend qSpeak's capabilities.
WebSocketServerDescription: Configure qSpeak's built-in WebSocket server for remote control.
EnableWebSocketServerDescription: Allow qSpeak to accept remote WebSocket connections.
WebSocketServerPortDescription: Port that qSpeak will listen on when the server is enabled.
WebSocketServerPasswordDescription: Protect access to the WebSocket server with a password.
DeleteToolWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the tool.
ManagePersonasDescription1: Create and customize different personas for various tasks.
ManagePersonasDescription2: Personas allow you to define the behavior and response of your assistant.
PersonasTip: You can start creating personas by starting from one of our existing variants or by creating a new one from scratch.
DeletePersonaWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the persona.
PersonaWithNameAlreadyExists: Persona with this name already exists
ModelWithNameAlreadyExists: Model with this name already exists
PersonaIconDescription: Click to change the icon for your persona.
PersonaIconSelectorDescription: Select an icon that best represents your persona's personality and purpose.
ExamplesDescription: Provide example questions and answers to help the AI understand your persona better.
Question: Question
AnswerPlaceholder: Enter how the persona should respond...
AddModelDescription: Add a new conversation model by providing the model identifier, API endpoint, and optional API key.
AddModelPageDescription: Configure a new conversation model for AI assistance.
APIKeyDescription: Optional API key for authentication. Leave empty if not required.
